channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:32 Drive alarm to the Kiev region. Since further reports.
item.description: 游릭 08:32 Drive alarm to the Kiev region. Since further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:32 Drive alarm to the Chernihiv region. Watch for further messages.

item.title: 游리 08:25 The threat of shelling in Marganets and Manganese territorial community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region

item.title: 游댮 08:04 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
